name: ReThrive
description:
ReThrive

Rethrive is a single player puzzle platformer. You play as Leafy, a slowly wilting plant that is attempting to climb up the mountainous landscape and reach sunlight to survive. But the vertical world is filled with puzzles that need solving to advance. Leafy is able to plant seeds to create clones of itself which it uses to help solve the puzzle.

Keyboard Controls

Move: W / A / S / D  

Look around: Mouse

Plant seed / Interact: E

Clear Dirt: Hold E

Wilt: Q

Controller Controls

Move: Left joystick

Jump: X

Look around: Right joystick

Plant seed / Interact: Circle

Clear dirt: Hold circle

Wilt: Triangle
